perturbation.original_text: A. In consideration for providing these Services, MKOS shall pay UTEK $120,000 in the form of unregistered shares of common stock (923,077 shares) upon the execution of this Strategic Alliance Agreement. 1/12th of the shares (76,923) shall vest each month during the term of this Agreement. In lieu of payment of shares, MKOS shall have the option of paying UTEK $10,000 per month for the Services described in this Agreement. If this Agreement is terminated any unvested shares will be returned to MKOS.
perturbation.changed_text: A. In consideration for providing these Services, MKOS shall pay UTEK $120,000 in the form of unregistered shares of common stock (923,077 shares) upon the execution of this Strategic Alliance Agreement. 1/12th of the shares (76,923) shall vest each month during the term of this Agreement. In lieu of payment of shares, MKOS shall have the option of paying UTEK $10,000 per month for the Services described in this Agreement. If this Agreement is terminated any unvested shares will be returned to MKOS. However, in the event of termination, UTEK shall retain all vested and unvested shares as a termination fee.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a conflict regarding the treatment of unvested shares upon termination. The original text states that unvested shares will be returned to MKOS. The added sentence states that UTEK shall retain all shares, creating an in-text contradiction about the fate of unvested shares and introducing uncertainty in enforcement upon the contract termination.

perturbation.original_text: B. In consideration for the services to be provided herein, MKOS agrees that it will remit the agreed upon stock certificate or cash payment within five (5) days of both parties executing this Agreement. If no consideration is received in the timeline, UTEK has the unilateral option to terminate this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: B. In consideration for the services to be provided herein, MKOS agrees that it will remit the agreed upon stock certificate or cash payment within five (5) days of both parties executing this Agreement. If no consideration is received in the timeline, UTEK has the unilateral option to terminate this Agreement. However, UTEK's right to terminate is waived if MKOS provides written notice within 3 days of UTEK's intent to terminate stating a valid reason for the delay, such as administrative error.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a conflict regarding UTEK's right to terminate the agreement for late payment. The original text grants UTEK a unilateral option to terminate if payment is not received within five days. The added sentence allows MKOS to waive this right by providing written notice of a valid reason for delay, contradicting the original unilateral termination right of UTEK and creating uncertainty in enforcement about payment deadlines.

perturbation.original_text: Either party may terminate this Agreement at any time with 30 days written notice.
perturbation.changed_text: Either party may terminate this Agreement at any time with 30 days written notice. However, if UTEK terminates the agreement prior to the 12-month term, UTEK is required to provide a refund to MKOS, covering the remaining months, calculated using the monthly payment alternative as indicated in section IV A.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a conflict regarding the consequences of termination. The original text allows either party to terminate with 30 days' notice, implying no penalty. The added sentence states that if UTEK terminates early, it is required to provide a refund to MKOS, contradicting the original term of termination and creating uncertainty in enforcement upon termination by UTEK before the defined 12-month term.
